channel.title: Selfhosting on Aspect
channel.description: Recent content in Selfhosting on Aspect

item.title: Self Hosting Your Own Search Engine
item.description: You need to host your own search engine. Why? Because Google, Microsoft, even DuckDuckGo, who has a weird relationship with Microsoft, are all tracking you. In fact, Google itself has said that it stores more than an exabyte of your data. That’s kinda creepy. Even though most of us have nothing to hide from Google (right?), we could all do with a bit more privacy. For just ten minutes of your time, and a payment of pocket change every month, you’ll be able to host your own search engine, along with a bunch of other stuff which I will cover in future guides.
